meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tart or sour in taste.
meanings.sent1: The tartnesses of the lemonade made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the tartnesses of green apples.
meanings.sent3: The tartnesses of the vinegar in the salad dressing woke me up!
meanings.sent4: Her words had a tartnesses that stung like vinegar.
meanings.sent5: The tartnesses of the unripe berries made my cheeks ache.

meanings.definition: The presence of sharpness or acidity in flavor.
meanings.sent1: The tartnesses of the wine left a lingering taste on my tongue.
meanings.sent2: The tartnesses of the orange juice complemented the sweetness of the pancakes.
meanings.sent3: The tartnesses of the tomato sauce added a zing to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent4: His criticism had a tartnesses that cut through the room.
meanings.sent5: The tartnesses of the pickles made my eyes water.
